piece_seed_totem_auto_field_description: Disperses seeds in a rectangular area
tutorial_seed_totem_topic: You have built a Seed Totem
tutorial_seed_totem_text:
A <color=yellow>Seed Totem</color> will plant stored seeds in an area around it.
Try <color=yellow>hitting it</color> when the surrounding plants are <color=yellow>fully grown and ready to pick</color>.
tutorial_auto_field_topic: You have built an Advanced Seed Totem
tutorial_auto_field_text:
This <color=yellow>Advanced Seed Totem</color> has been modified to plant stored seeds in a rectangular area behind it.
Try <color=yellow>hitting it</color> when the plants in the field are <color=yellow>fully grown and ready to pick</color>.
